thread.title: Zedd to perform for UTSA students next week at Victoria's Secret party
thread.title_full: Zedd to perform for UTSA students next week at Victoria's Secret party - San Antonio Express-News

author: Madalyn Mendoza
title: Zedd to perform for UTSA students next week at Victoria's Secret party
text:

(Photo by John Parra/Getty Images for Victoria's Secret) (L-R) Victoria's Secret PINK models Gigi Hadid and Rachel Hilbert attend the Ultimate Spring Break Bash hosted by Victoria's Secret PINK Nation at Surfcomber Miami, South Beach on March 14, 2015 in Miami ... more Image 18 of 19 Victoria's Secret PINK models Gigi Hadid (L) and Rachel Hilbert (R) and DJ Irie attend the Ultimate Spring Break Bash hosted by Victoria's Secret PINK Nation at Surfcomber Miami, South Beach on March 14, 2015 in Miami Beach, Florida. (Photo by John Parra/Getty Images for Victoria's Secret) Victoria's Secret PINK models Gigi Hadid (L) and Rachel Hilbert (R) and DJ Irie attend the Ultimate Spring Break Bash hosted by Victoria's Secret PINK Nation at Surfcomber Miami, South Beach on March 14, ... more Image 19 of 19 Zedd to perform for UTSA students next week at Victoria's Secret party 1 / 19 Back to Gallery UTSA's rowdy Roadrunners will be partying with EDM artist Zedd next week at the Victoria’s Secret party they fought tooth-and-nail for.
The school’s Twitter account shared the highly-anticipated news with a link to an E! News article that has all the event details.
In September, thousands of UTSA students competed against 99 other college campuses to win the Victoria’s Secret Pink Campus Showdown by playing a series of games on the store’s smartphone app.
RELATED: UTSA wins Victoria's Secret party despite sour remarks from competing school
The final showdown, a tapping competition, had rules as simple as it sounded but it quickly turned into a ferocious battle of masses tapping away on their phone screens as much as they possibly could against the Louisiana State University student body. Students reported they collectively tapped a total of 367,598,462 times to beat the Tigers.
Though the prize was in the bag, Roadrunners waited weeks to hear who they had relentlessly fought to see in concert, until Wednesday morning when E! announced it would be the popular DJ behind hit tracks like “I Want You to Know” and “Clarity.”
The university’s communications department did not immediately return a request for comment but E! reported Victoria’s Secret PINK models, Rachel Hilbert and Jessica Strother, will join Zedd at the party.
A Facebook event page created by the lingerie company marks Wednesday, Oct. 28 at 5 p.m. in Lot BK5 as the time and place for the fun.
mmendoza@mysa.com
